problem_text_cn: 如图,△ABC中,AB=6,AC=9,BD、CD分别平分∠ABC,∠ACB过点D作直线平行于BC,分别交AB、AC于E、F,则△AEF的周长为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in △ABC, AB = N_0, AC = N_1, BD and CD are bisected into ∠ABC, ∠ACB crossing point D as a straight line parallel to BC, and crossing AB and AC at E and F respectively, then the perimeter of △AEF for()
raw_answer: 解:∵EF∥BC,∴∠EDB=∠DBC,∠FDC=∠DCB,∵△ABC中,∠ABC和∠ACB的平分线相交于点D,∴∠EBD=∠DBC,∠FCD=∠DCB,∴∠EDB=∠EBD,∠FDC=∠FCD,∴ED=EB,FD=FC,∵AB=6,AC=9,∴△AEF的周长为:AE+EF+AF=AE+ED+FD+AF=AE+EB+FC+AF=AB+AC=6+9=15．故选:D．
